NO_BOOKS_FOUND_MESSAGE: There are no books available in the collection right now.
PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Password must be atleast {{minLength}} characters long
FORM_FIELD_MIN_LENGTH: {{fieldName}} must be at least {{minLength}} characters long
PASSWORD_INVALID_PATTERN: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character (@$!%*?&)
FORM_FIELD_MAX_LENGTH: {{fieldName}} cannot be more than {{maxLength}} characters long
USERNAME_INVALID_PATTERN: Username can only contain letters, numbers and underscore
PROJECTS_DESCRIPTION: Here you can view your projects, the projects you are in, and create new ones.
INVITE_USER_DESCRIPTION: Invite a user to the project by their username
PROJECT_INVITATION: {{inviterName}} invited you to join project "{{projectName}}" as a {{roleName}}.
INVITATION_ACCEPTED: {{inviterName}} accepted your invitation to join project "{{projectName}}" as a {{roleName}}.
INVITATION_DECLINED: {{inviterName}} declined your invitation to join project "{{projectName}}" as a {{roleName}}.
CREATE_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION: Create a new project providing a name and a description. You'll be {{roleName}}.
